win_condition.primary: Kill Enemy General immediately OR Drain Reinforcements via Captains/Towers
win_condition.kill_policy: IGNORE ALL KILLS that do not directly contribute to an objective.

priority_legend.Priority 99: Do Not Do / Waste of Time

Alliance.name: Vanndar Stormpike
Alliance.mechanic: Stacks 'Stormpike Battle Standard' (HP Buff) - scales with Bunkers.

Horde.name: Drek'Thar
Horde.mechanic: Stacks 'Frostwolf Battle Standard' (HP Buff) - scales with Towers.

Alliance.name: Captain Balinda Stonehearth
Alliance.mechanic: Casts spells. Interruptible. Kill for -100 Reinforcements.

Horde.name: Captain Galvangar
Horde.mechanic: Melee cleave. Fear. Kill for -100 Reinforcements.

movement.rule: Mount up and ride past enemies.
movement.road_fighting: STRICTLY FORBIDDEN. Do not dismount to fight 1v1s.
movement.objectives: Ride directly to Captain -> Ride directly to Towers -> Ride directly to General.

combat.rule: Only fight Commanders, Captains, and players defending them.
combat.turtle_breaking: If stuck at a choke, focus Fire on Healers to break the line, then PUSH THROUGH. Do not farm honor.

Captains.strategy: Top Priority. Kill = -100 Reinforcements. Ignore defenders, burn the boss.

Towers_Bunkers.strategy: Cap, Leave 2 Defenders to 'Spin', Main Force moves on.

General.strategy: Tank and Spank. Do not pull Warmasters unless necessary.

Graveyards.strategy: Only cap specific forward GYs. Do NOT cap Snowfall (Waste of time). Do NOT cap defensive GYs (Slows game).

rush_tactics.name: Drek-Or-Die
steps: Ride to Relief Hut -> Cap FW Towers -> Kill Drek.

rush_tactics.name: Vanndar Rush
steps: Ride to Dun Baldar -> Cap DB Towers -> Kill Vanndar.
